verses.roman:
śūro mātāmahaḥ kaccit
svasty āste vātha māriṣaḥ
mātulaḥ sānujaḥ kaccit
kuśaly ānakadundubhiḥ

synonyms: śūraḥ—Śūrasena; mātāmahaḥ—maternal grandfather; kaccit—whether; svasti—all good; āste—passing his days; vā—or; atha—therefore; māriṣaḥ—respectful; mātulaḥ—maternal uncle; sa-anujaḥ—with his younger brothers; kaccit—whether; kuśalī—all well; ānaka-dundubhiḥ—Vasudeva.
translation: Is my respectable grandfather Śūrasena in a happy mood? And are my maternal uncle Vasudeva and his younger brothers all doing well?
